PayApp Context Processors

payapp.context_processors.get_unread_notifications(request)

This function returns the number of incoming transactions for the logged-in user :param request: HttpRequest object :return: Dictionary containing the count of incoming requests

payapp.context_processors.user_balance(request)

This function returns the balance of the logged-in user :param request: :return:

payapp.context_processors.user_currency(request)

This function returns the currency of the logged-in user :param request: :return:
